Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 45th overall pick, by West Texas in 1979...
Traded from West Texas to Diablo on 7/21/1979 (Going to WT: P R. Plourde. Going to DIA: 1B E. Aguiar)...
Traded from Diablo to Boston (UBA) on 7/21/1981 (Going to DIA: 1B R. Dorn. Going to PIL: 3B S. Wesson, 1B E. Aguiar)...
Had first career hit on 6/21/1985, off Christopher Headrick (PON)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/12/1985, off Warren Venne (HAL)...
Injured on 6/21/1986 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 7/31/1986...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Diablo on 7/3/1987...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Pittsburgh on 9/11/1987...
